channel.title: Tototl
channel.description: A Lightweight Twitter Client for Mac OSX in Cocoa.

item.title: Tototl 1.6.1
item.description:
Tototl 1.6.1

New in this version

  • New Milky Interface
  • New iChat Interface
  • New Configurable Dock Icon
  • Configurable Status Bar Single Click Action
  • Configurable Font Size and Row Height in Old Interface
  • Old Interface Now implements the new functions (Char counting, Post Bar, etc)
  • Tiny (HUD) Interface Now implements the new functions (Char counting, Post Bar, etc)
  • Clicking on Dock will open window

item.title: Tototl 1.6
item.description:
Tototl 1.6

New in this version

  • New Milky Interface
  • Stability and Security Improvements

item.title: Tototl 1.5.1
item.description:
Tototl 1.5.1

New in this version

  • Fixed a problem with 1.5 that prevented the New Twitter Post Window to Open

    • Security

  • Tototl now uses keychain

    • Stability

  • Fixed extrange bug when reading preferences

item.title: Tototl 1.5
item.description:
Tototl 1.5

New in this version

    Security

  • Tototl now uses keychain

    • Stability

  • Fixed extrange bug when reading preferences

item.title: Tototl 1.4
item.description:
Tototl 1.4

New in this version

    Twitter Interaction

  • Configurable Notifications Delivery Method
  • Respond clicking on username link

    • Interface / Human Interaction / Visual Feedback

  • New Tiny Interface (HUD)
  • Configurable sounds
  • New message color configuration
  • Real-Time character counting (MacBuddysupport Request)

    • Preferences

  • New donate button :D
  • Highly configurable update preferences

item.title: Tototl 1.3
item.description:
Tototl 1.3

New in this version

  • Configurable Location
  • Clickable Links
  • Search bar
  • New Design
  • An option to get back the previous design

item.title: Tototl 1.2.2
item.description:
Tototl 1.2.2

New in this version

  • Update Frequency is now configurable (default 120 seconds)
  • New Application Icon
